name: Sheraton Grand Jakarta Gandaria City Hotel

address.fullAddress: Jl. Sultan Iskandar Muda, 12240 Jakarta, Indonesia

description: Sheraton Grand Jakarta Gandaria City Hotel offers accommodations in the heart of emerging commercial hub and primer residential area in South Jakarta, 1.7 mi from MRT Blok M and 1.9 mi from MRT Blok A. The hotel has an outdoor pool and views of the city, and guests can enjoy a drink at the bar. The hotel is a part of a superblock complex offering a retail shopping mall, offices and convention/exhibition facilities.

name: The Bellezza Hotel Suites

address.fullAddress: Jl. Letjen Soepeno No.34, Alteri Permata Hijau, 12210 Jakarta, Indonesia

description: Luxurious comfort awaits guests at The Bellezza Hotel Suites. Featuring an outdoor pool, indoor tennis court and a jogging track, this hotel houses a restaurant and spacious rooms overlooking the city. Free internet access is available in some rooms.

name: Azana Suites Hotel Antasari

address.fullAddress: Jl. Pangeran Antasari No. 75, 12430 Jakarta, Indonesia

description: Located 4 miles from Pondok Indah Mall, Azana Suites Hotel Antasari offers 4-star accommodations in Jakarta and has a terrace, a restaurant and a bar. The property is around 4.9 miles from Pacific Place, 5.1 miles from Ragunan Zoo and 5.2 miles from Plaza Senayan. The hotel has an outdoor swimming pool and room service and free WiFi throughout the property.

name: Menara Peninsula Hotel

address.fullAddress: Jalan Letjen S Parman 78, Slipi, 11410 Jakarta, Indonesia

description: A 15-minute drive from Mall Taman Anggrek, Menara Peninsula Hotel features an outdoor pool, 4 dining options and free WiFi access. In-room dining service is available 24 hours. Guests who drive park for free. Menara Peninsula Hotel is a 20-minute drive from Sudirman area and a 30-minute drive from Senayan City and Plaza Senayan Shopping Mall. Soekarno-Hatta International Airport is 45 minutes drive away from the property. Airport transfers can be arranged at a charge.

name: Samala Hotel Jakarta Cengkareng

address.fullAddress: Jalan Letjen S Parman 78, Slipi, 11410 Jakarta, Indonesia

description: Located in Jakarta, 6.6 miles from Central Park Mall, Samala Hotel Jakarta Cengkareng features views of the city. Featuring a garden, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property provides a shared lounge, room service and currency exchange for guests.

name: The Luxton Cirebon Hotel and Convention

address.fullAddress: Jl. R. A. Kartini No. 60, 45122 Cirebon, Indonesia

description: Located in Cirebon, The Luxton Cirebon Hotel and Convention offers a spa center, sauna and an outdoor pool. Guests can enjoy a la carte menu at the restaurant or a drink at the bar. Free private parking is available on site. Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and features a flat-screen TV. Enjoy a cup of tea while looking out at the sea or mountains. Every room is equipped with a private bathroom with a shower. Extras include slippers and free toiletries.

name: Hotel Rajawali RedPartner

address.fullAddress: Jl. Rajawali Barat II No.5, Kecapi, Kec. Harjamukti, Kota Cirebon, Jawa Barat, 45142 Cirebon, Indonesia

description: Hotel Rajawali RedPartner is located in Cirebon, within 2.6 miles of Cirebon Waterland and 1.5 miles of Kasepuhan Palace. The 2-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. Sunyaragi Cave is 1.7 miles from the hotel and Kanoman Palace is 2.4 miles away.

name: Amaris Hotel Cirebon

address.fullAddress: Jalan Siliwangi No.70, 45121 Cirebon, Indonesia

description: Hotel Rajawali RedPartner is located in Cirebon, within 2.6 miles of Cirebon Waterland and 1.5 miles of Kasepuhan Palace. The 2-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. Sunyaragi Cave is 1.7 miles from the hotel and Kanoman Palace is 2.4 miles away.

name: Hotel Sampurna Cirebon

address.fullAddress: Jl Tentara Pelajar no 5b, 45131 Cirebon, Indonesia

description: Located within 1.5 miles of Cirebon Waterland and 1.1 miles of Kanoman Palace, Hotel Sampurna Cirebon has rooms in Cirebon. With a terrace, the 1-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property provides room service and a 24-hour front desk for guests.

name: Star House

address.fullAddress: Jl. Aria Kiban, Cirebon, Jawa Barat, Cirebon, 45131 Cirebon, Indonesia

description: Located in Cirebon, 1.9 miles from Cirebon Waterland, Star House has air-conditioned accommodations and a terrace. This 2-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk. Sunyaragi Cave is 2.2 miles away and Mount Cereme is 31 miles from the hotel.

name: Armi Hotel Malang

address.fullAddress: Jl. Kaliurang No.63, Lowokwaru, Klojen, 65111 Malang, Indonesia

description: Located in Malang, 1.4 miles from Taman Rekreasi Senaputra, Armi Hotel Malang has accommodations with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. The property is around 1.7 miles from Alun - Alun Kota Malang, 1.8 miles from Alun-alun Tugu and 1.8 miles from Taman Rekreasi Kota. The property provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transportation, room service and free WiFi.

name: Flyover Arjosari Hotel

address.fullAddress: Jl. A. Yani No.10, Polowijen, Kec. Blimbing, Kota Malang, Jawa Timur, 65126 Malang, Indonesia

description: Flyover Arjosari Hotel provides free WiFi throughout the property and rooms with air conditioning in Malang. The property is around 2.4 miles from Araya Golf & Family Club, 2.7 miles from Museum Mpu Purwa and 3.6 miles from Taman Rekreasi Senaputra. Alun-alun Tugu is 4 miles away and Taman Rekreasi Kota is 4 miles from the hotel.

name: The Shalimar Boutique Hotel

address.fullAddress: Jalan Cerme 16, 65112 Malang, Indonesia

description: Located in Malang, a 7-minute walk from Malang Library, The Shalimar Boutique Hotel has accommodations with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness center and a garden. Among the various facilities are a terrace and a bar. The property provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transportation, room service and free WiFi throughout the property.

name: Sans Hotel Fif Fa

address.fullAddress: Jl. Pisang Kipas No. A2, Jatimulyo, Kec. Lowokwaru, Kota Malang, Jawa Timur 65141, Indonesia,

description: Sans Hotel Fif Fa is located in Malang, within a 14-minute walk of Museum Mpu Purwa and one mile of Universitas Brawijaya Malang. The 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. Tlogomas Recreation Park is 2.7 miles from the hotel and Malang Library is 3 miles away.

name: Lux Tychi Hotel

address.fullAddress: Jl. Jaksa Agung Suprapto, 17, 65112 Malang, Indonesia

description: Lux Tychi Hotel features an outdoor swimming pool and spacious, air-conditioned rooms with private bathrooms and seating areas. It offers a 24-hour coffee shop, a karaoke room and free wireless hotspots. The rooms are simple, featuring elegant furniture and crisp linen. Some rooms have dining areas and additional facilities like a mini-bar, coffee/tea making facilities and a bathroom with a bathtub.

name: Emerald Garden International Hotel

address.fullAddress: Jl. K.L. Yos Sudarso No. 1 PO BOX 2388 , 20235 Medan, Indonesia

description: Emerald Garden International Hotel is centrally located in the business center of Medan City. It features a large outdoor swimming pool and meeting rooms. The hotel also features 2 restaurants and free WiFi in the entire property. Free shuttle to Center Point Mall and Podomoro City Deli Medan is provided.

name: Prime Hotel

address.fullAddress: Jl. Arteri Kualanamu, Tumpatan Nibung, Batang Kuis, Deli Serdang, 20552 Medan, Indonesia

description: Prime Plaza Kualanamu-Medan is set in Kampungbesar. This property also houses a restaurant, a fitness center, a business center and an outdoor pool with kids area. Spacious free parking is available on site. All rooms at the hotel are fitted with a seating area. The private bathroom is equipped with standing shower and complete amenities. At Prime Plaza Kualanamu-Medan rooms are fitted with air conditioning and LED TV, fridge, and personal safe.

name: Karibia Boutique Hotel

address.fullAddress: Jln. Timor Blok J No. I-IV, 20231 Medan, Indonesia

description: Karibia Boutique Hotel offers luxurious, air-conditioned rooms with private bathrooms. This hotel is located right in the heart of the city and right next to the city's largest shopping mall, Center Point Mall, as well as the railway station.

name: JW Marriott Hotel Medan

address.fullAddress: Jalan Putri Hijau No. 10, 20111 Medan, Indonesia

description: Centrally located, JW Marriott Hotel Medan offers accommodations with 55-inch LED TVs. It features an outdoor infinity pool, a 24-hour fitness center, a spa and 6 dining options. Shuttle from Center Point Mall is provided. Each spacious guestroom comes equipped with an iPod dock and mini-bar. Free bottle water and a tea/coffee maker are provided. Attached bathrooms feature rain showers.

name: Deli Hotel

address.fullAddress: Jalan Abdullah Lubis No. 79A, 20153 Medan, Indonesia

description: Located within 2.7 miles of Medan Train Station and 2.7 miles of Maimun Palace, Deli Hotel provides rooms in Medan. Featuring a restaurant, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property has room service and a 24-hour front desk for guests.

name: Kuta Paradiso Hotel

address.fullAddress: Jl. Kartika Plaza, Tuban, Bali, 80361 Kuta, Indonesia

description: Paradiso is located at the south of Kuta Beach, a 10-minute drive from Bali International Airport. The hotel offers free-form outdoor pools and 6 dining options. Families with children can make use of the kids corner and playground. Free WiFi is accessible in all areas and free scheduled airport shuttle is provided.

name: The Magani Hotel and Spa

address.fullAddress: Jalan Melasti, Legian Kelod, 80361 Legian, Indonesia

description: The Magani Hotel and Spa is located in between downtown Kuta and Legian area, a 3-minute walk from Kuta Beach. It offers a spa and outdoor swimming pool. Free Wi-Fi is provided in all areas and free on-site parking is available.

name: Bisma Eight

address.fullAddress: Jalan Bisma , 80571 Ubud, Indonesia

description: Located a few minutes' away from central Ubud, Bisma Eight offers spacious contemporary rooms with traditional Japanese soaking tub. It also features an outdoor temperature-controlled pool and free WiFi access throughout.

name: Barclona Lovina

address.fullAddress: Jalan Mawar Lovina Desa kalibukbuk, 81119 Buleleng

description: Barclona Lovina offers air-conditioned accommodations in Buleleng. This beachfront property offers access to a terrace, free private parking, and free Wifi. The property has a garden and a traditional restaurant that serves Indonesian cuisine.

name: The Kana Kuta Hotel

address.fullAddress: Jalan Setiabudi No 8, 80361 Kuta, Indonesia

description: Located 5 minutes walk from Bali Galeria Shopping Center, The Kana Kuta Hotel offers an outdoor swimming pool. Free WiFi access is available throughout the property. Air-conditioned rooms here will provide guests with a flat-screen satellite TV, seating area and a dining area with an electric kettle. The private bathroom comes with shower facilities, free toiletries, dental kit and slippers on request.
